name: Powder Game (2021)
description:
Imagine the pleasant phenomenon of the wind blowing the falling leaves. The physics of this game simulates the phenomenon with dust (dots)!

You can choose from over 30 different stitch variations. Water, fire, oil, gunpowder, metal, seeds, birds, ants and many more.

The various reactions when the collision between the points occurs. The explosion as they collided, with fire and gunpowder. Trees that grow when the seed and the sand collide.

In "Edit mode", you can create from scratch. In "View mode", you can see work that has been done on other people's work.
